body:
Create a workflow that can send a mail or create a text file that consists of the current state of the repository and how things are currently going. It should return the following:

- Current issues
- Current PRs (both opened and closed for the sprint/milestone)
- Current progress of the milestone
- How many branches that are currently open and unmerged

Comment on this issue if there is anything else we could need for the sprint planning/retro.
title: Create a workflow that summaries repo state

title: Create a workflow that summaries repo state
